item.title: Quick tip: VMware VCSA installer page is blank when selecting a datastore
item.description: While upgrading a vCenter Server 6.7 to version 7 Update 3 using the vCenter Server 7 UI installer, I was not able to select a datastore for installing the new vCenter Server Appliance (VCSA). The datastore selection was blank as shown in the following image. This issue still exists in the vCenter Server 7 UI installer.
